settings.title: Settings
settings.appearance.title: Appearance
settings.appearance.theme.title: Theme
settings.appearance.theme.description: Select the theme you want to use.
settings.filter.title: Filter Control
settings.filter.hideSuspiciousAccounts.d: Hide tweets from accounts with default avatars, no bio and zero followers. Their content will be automatically hidden.
settings.filter.hideSpamAccounts.descrip: Block tweets from accounts that are marked as spam.
settings.filter.hideMutedWords.descripti: Hide/Block tweets that contain muted words.
settings.filter.hideModListAccounts.desc: Hide/Block tweets from accounts that are subscribed to a Moderation Lists.
settings.filter.hideBlueVerifiedAccounts: Hide tweets from blue verified accounts, except those you follow.
settings.privacy.title: Privacy and security
settings.privacy.clearAllCache.title: Clear All Cache
settings.privacy.clearAllCache.descripti: Clear all cache data, including record users and tweets.
settings.languages.title: Languages
settings.languages.description: Select which language to use for the extension's user interface.
